description:
Toguro begins to suck the souls of the spectators in order to enrage the fallen Urameshi and bring out his full power. But Toguro soon learns that the best way to provoke Yusuke is to kill one of his friends!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yusuke, o misiune tristă. La maxim
Yuusuke! Genkai e no Kanashii Shiren
幽助! 限界への悲しい試練
